com.viaoa.comm.multiplexer.io

Class MultiplexerOutputStreamController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.comm.multiplexer.io.MultiplexerOutputStreamController

  • public class MultiplexerOutputStreamController
extends Object
    Internally created by MultiplexerSocketController to manage the OutputStream for the "real" socket.
    Author:
    vvia

    • Method Detail

      • setThrottleLimit

        public void setThrottleLimit(int mbPerSecond)
        Throttle to limit the number of MB per second, calculated 10 times per second. if 0 then no limit. Each write will check to see if the max has been written for the current time slice (10th sec), and sleep for the remainder if the limit has been exceeded.

      • getThrottleLimit

        public int getThrottleLimit()

      • getWriteCount

        public long getWriteCount()
        Returns:
        number of writes made.

      • getWriteSize

        public long getWriteSize()

      • getMaxWriteLength

        protected int getMaxWriteLength(VirtualSocket vs,
                                int requestSize)
        Used to determine the max size that can be written to real socket per request. This is a recommendation, and is not enforced when writing to the real outputstream.

      • sendPingCommand

        public void sendPingCommand()
                     throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • onSocketException

        protected void onSocketException(Exception e)

      • sendCommand

        protected void sendCommand(int cmd,
                           int param)
                    throws IOException
        Send a command to receiver. The command is then read by MultiplexerInputStreamController.readRealSocket() can processed by MultiplexerInputStreamController and/or MultiplexerSocketController.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • sendCommand

        protected void sendCommand(int cmd,
                           int param,
                           String serverSocketName)
                    throws IOException
        Send a command to receiver. The command is then read by MultiplexerInputStreamController.readRealSocket() can processed by MultiplexerInputStreamController and/or MultiplexerSocketController.
        Parameters:
        cmd - see MultiplexerSocketController for list of commands
        Throws:
        IOException
